text: The Enemy is a young adult horror novel. It was written by English author Charlie Higson. The novel takes place in London. It is about the life of children after a worldwide sickness has turned adults into zombies. It was published by Puffin Books in the UK on 3 September 2009. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2009 books Category:British young adult novels Category:Horror novels
title: The Enemy (Higson novel)
